department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Tutorial - Sophomore Year
course.faculty_text: Ruth S. Lingford and members of the Department
course.description: Individual instruction in subjects of special interest that cannot be studied in regular courses. Concentrators wishing to take a tutorial in their sophomore year must find a member of the faculty to advise the project and submit an application to the Director of Undergraduate Studies.
course.notes: Optional for sophomore concentrators. Letter-graded only. Tutorials are led by individual faculty members; however study cards should be signed by the Director of Undergraduate Studies.
